Content: I had also thought of doing Black Clover which is a guilty pleasure read of mine_  but the beginning of the anime has some real pacing issues_ or at least is really slow.

Which is a shame because from what I see it speeds up a lot after the first arc or two.NLNLI had initially wanted to show a One Piece movie as that is my jam_ but theres a bit too much fanservice_ like Nami in Strong World ;_;
Dont know enough about Lives to show tonight_ but I have it saved for later viewing.
Digimon I could roll with it if I can find it. The isekai premise makes it start pretty quickly
Speaking of Digimon movie_ I did debate Summer Wars but I think it would be good for slightly older.
